causeSpecific: Worker fell from a height of 10 meters due to improperly secured scaffolding. Lack of safety harness.
A hammer was dropped from the 5th floor, striking a worker on the ground who was not wearing a hard hat.
Contact with an unmarked high-voltage power line during excavation work. The area was not properly surveyed before digging.
Operator's hand was caught in the rotating machinery of a concrete mixer. Machine guard was removed for maintenance and not replaced.
Worker slipped on a wet surface on the top floor and fell down a staircase. No warning signs for the wet area.
